attributes.action: Fertility Fairness: Enforce 3 Rounds of IVF on the NHS!
attributes.additional_details: The UK is facing a fertility crisis—yet access to NHS IVF depends on your postcode. We urge the government to make all ICBs follow NICE guidelines and offer 3 funded IVF cycles. Fertility care must be fair, equal, and nationwide. Everyone deserves a chance.
attributes.background: We call on the UK Government to make all ICBs follow NICE guidelines and offer 3 NHS-funded IVF cycles. End the postcode lottery—fertility treatment should be fair, equal, and based on medical need, not where you live. Everyone deserves a chance to build a family.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Increase funding for IVF & fertility treatments to increase access.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711621
